title: In The Eye of The Beholder:  A Novel of The Phantom of the Opera
description: When French equestrian Claire Delacroix loses her fiance in a tragic accident, she comes to live at the Paris Opera during its 1890s heyday. Whilst working at the opera, she meets a mysterious, masked stranger: Erik. Is it possible that the two of them will heal the pain of each other's past?
author: Sharon E. Cathcart
